leadspace.title: Customer engagement: Any time. Anywhere.
leadspace.content: Build a custom video, voice or messaging solution with a single easy-to-use platform.

about.name: About
about.title: A marketplace for cloud communication assets unlike any other.

content.main: Fonoster has developed an ecosystem that provides business with more value-added services at better prices. Businesses can implement whatever combination of services and apps that will best serve their customers -- and stop paying for other services they don’t need.

list.title: Supports assets:
items: Text to speech / Speech to text

benefits.name: Benefits
benefits.title: Fonoster’s mission is to bring together businesses, developers, and asset providers in a way that allows everyone to win.

lists.title: For businesses
items: Bring your preferred trunk provider or partner with one of ours to take advantage of the best prices for call termination

lists.title: For developers
items: Choose the most suitable provider for your project
Partner with one of our Trunking Service Providers based on individual project requirements

lists.title: For asset providers
items: Take advantage of increased exposure to potential users in a secured blockchain-based channel of distribution

content.main: The marketplace brings together businesses, developers, and asset providers in a mutually beneficial platform. Users do business through a simple three-step process:

lists.title: Step One:
lists.content: An Asset Provider publishes a service offer with accompanying contract agreements to a registry. After a reviewing process, the service offer will appear on the Public Offer Catalog.

lists.title: Step Two:
lists.content: Businesses discover Assets in the public offer catalog that meet their unique needs.

lists.title: Step Three:
lists.content: Businesses follow an on-boarding process, accept the terms and conditions, and begin using the asset in their projects. They immediately have the tooling and SDKs to build, test, and deploy the applications.

gettingStarted.name: Getting started
gettingStarted.title: Build a custom application for your business, today.

content.main: Businesses can build an app quickly and seamlessly on the Fonoster platform.

lists.content: Find the perfect number for your project in the Marketplace.

lists.intro: 2. Build your app using our Smart APIs and SDKs.
lists.content: Create a smart video, voice or messaging application that meets your business needs without the clutter of unneeded features or historically burdensome customizations.

lists.intro: 3. Deploy your application to Fonoster Cloud.
lists.content: Once you’ve customized your app, launch and get started quickly.
Improve your application over time with A/B testing.

ctaBanner.headline: Ready to engage your clients better, faster?
ctaBanner.subheadline: Try us out to start building for free.
